select.title: Select
select.subtitle: Dropdown list for selecting one or multiple values with search, icons and keyboard navigation support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Minimal component configuration with placeholder and single value selection

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: State where selection is unavailable. All interactions and focus are blocked

disabledOption.title: Disabled Option
disabledOption.description: Example of a list where some options are unavailable for selection (disabled)

clearable.title: Clear Value
clearable.description: Shows clear button for quick reset of selected value

invalid.title: Invalid State
invalid.description: Visually emphasizes validation error, for example when form field is not filled

multiple.title: Multiple Selection
multiple.description: Allows selecting multiple values at once; selected items are displayed as tags

filled.title: Filled Variant
filled.description: Alternative styling variant with filled field instead of standard outline

fullWidth.title: Full Width
fullWidth.description: Component stretches to 100% of available container width

loading.title: Loading
loading.description: Shows loading indicator and blocks interaction while data is being fetched

filter.title: Option Search
filter.description: Enables quick search field for options list, filtering results as you type

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Demonstration of three standard sizes: small, standard and large

checkmark.title: Selected Mark
checkmark.description: Adds checkmark icon to selected option for better visual feedback

template.title: Custom Templates
template.description: Example of customizing value, options and icons display via slots

form.title: In Form
form.description: Integration with `CFormItem`: validation, error message and form submission

argTypes.modelValue: Current select value. For multiple â€” array of values, otherwise single value or null
argTypes.options: List of options. Each element: { label: string; value: any; disabled?: boolean }
argTypes.placeholder: Placeholder text when value is not selected
argTypes.disabled: Disables select and interaction with it
argTypes.clearable: Shows clear button for selected value
argTypes.loading: Displays loading state and blocks interaction
argTypes.checkmark: Show checkmark icon for selected option
argTypes.full: Stretch select to full available width
argTypes.optionLabel: Field name for option text in options object
argTypes.optionValue: Field name for option value in options object
argTypes.updatemodelValue: Event fired when model value changes (v-model)
argTypes.change: Event fired when user confirms selection
argTypes.search: Event fired when text is entered in search field
argTypes.select: Event fired when option is selected
argTypes.remove: Event fired when selected option is removed (in multiple)
argTypes.clear: Event fired when value is cleared
argTypes.value: Value slot (display selected value in trigger)
argTypes.footer: Slot for bottom part of dropdown list
argTypes.header: Slot for top part of dropdown list
